item.content:encoded:
Quick Translate

QuickTranslate is your go-to translator right in the macOS menu bar!


Need a quick translation? With QuickTranslate, the best translation services are just one click away. Simple, fast, and effective!

Access powerful translations from Google Translate and DeepL Translate in a sleek, user-friendly interface.

Installation

  1. Download the latest version from the Releases.
  2. Unzip the QuickTranslate.zip file.
  3. Move QuickTranslate.app to your Applications folder.
  4. Launch QuickTranslate.app. (If you see a security warning, just head to Privacy and Security settings to allow the app to run.)
  5. Enjoy hassle-free translations right from your menu bar!

Features

  • Instant access to Google Translate and DeepL Translate from your macOS menu bar.

Have an idea? We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Share your feedback and help us make QuickTranslate even better.

Support the Author

Like QuickTranslate? Buy me a coffee!

The post QuickTranslate – Instant Translations for macOS Menu Bar appeared first on Yanx Apps.

item.title: Translate App

item.description:

The post Translate App appeared first on Yanx Apps.
item.content:encoded:
Translate App | Google Translate for macOS

Translate App is a lightweight and powerful macOS application that gives users quick access to Google Translate right from the status bar. Designed for efficiency, it allows you to translate text from images and even supports voice translation with microphone permissions.

Features:

  • Quick Google Translate access: Instantly use Google Translate from your macOS status bar.
  • Image Translation: Open images to extract and translate text directly from them.
  • Launch on startup: Set the app to open automatically when you log in.
  • Integrated cookie management: Enjoy smoother functionality with built-in cookie management.
  • Swift concurrency model: Optimized with the latest Swift concurrency features for better performance.
  • Voice translation: The app can recognize and translate spoken words (microphone and speech recognition permissions required; Google login is necessary for voice translation).

How to Install:

  • Download
  • Move the Translate App to your Applications folder.
  • If you encounter a warning, go to your Mac‚Äôs Privacy & Security settings and allow the app to run.

Current Limitations:

  • File Downloads: This feature is not yet supported.

Keywords:

  • Swift concurrency macOS app
  • Google Translate macOS app
  • Quick access to Google Translate
  • Image translation macOS
  • Voice translation macOS

The post Translate App appeared first on Yanx Apps.
